titles.title: For the relief of Mary Yaros.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 3/23/1999--Introduced. Declares a named individual to be eligible for an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted into the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
